definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Her work is published online in Springer's journal Sex Roles.
sentences.chinese: 她的文章已发表在施普林格性别角色期刊上。

sentences.english: Popular music has always challenged sex roles, too.
sentences.chinese: 通俗音乐也常常会挑战性别角色。

sentences.english: This finding leads scientists to believe that gender roles are quite flexible.
sentences.chinese: 该发现使得科学家认为，性别角色是相当灵活的。

sentences.english: This study focuses on the causal relationship between women's sex-role attitudes and labor force participation.
sentences.chinese: 本研究探讨性别角色态度与就业间之因果关系。

sentences.english: What kind of gender roles do you expect of each other?
sentences.chinese: 你们期望对方扮演什么样的性别角色？

pinyin: xing4 bie2 ren4 tong2 zhang4 ai4

definition: male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
